1.1.4.name: wordpress/w3images
1.1.4.description:
W3IMAGES FEATURES

Upload single or multiples images. Unlimited sections and subsections. Set slide show for images to be displayed on three different ways:

  1. Simple js/html popup
  2. Slide in the same page (inline)
  3. Shadowbox ajax mode

All control over images gallery can be done from administration while any user (or specified users group you need) can upload images on any section. Moderation provided for images (enable or disable) and more features
